message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper is about generating natural language descriptions of images, which involves both computer vision and natural language processing. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) and cs.CL (Computation and Language) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also proposes a new algorithm that combines top-down and bottom-up approaches through a model of semantic attention, which involves learning to selectively attend to semantic concept proposals and fuse them into hidden states and outputs of recurrent neural networks. This suggests that the paper may also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.IR (Information Retrieval) sub-categories.
